A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is bad written and lacks rythm. I liked ep.VII\, which not only was not a bad movie but also a quite pleasing iteration of the saga\, but I find this film fuzzy and disrespectful to the whole saga. It does not have a clear goal and it spends an hour and a half in a plot that is poorly written and that in the end does not affect the final output of the movie.\nThis is a bad movie and what is worse\, it damages the Star Wars saga.
